attributes.action: abolish the Dangerous Dogs Act in place of 'the Dangerous Owners Act'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why do we have a scapegoat law that allows the cruel owners of dogs that have been trained to attack to get away with little or virtually no punishment whilst the dogs get 'put down'? Why do murderers get to keep their lives whilst these innocent dogs get killed for their owner’s violent actions? We rehabilitate murderers - why can we not give second chances to dogs that have been brought up poorly - is it their fault they have been taken advantage of in such a malicious way? Surely destroying these defenceless animals is the 'easy' way out - their owners will still be out there able to do it again!
